commentText: Take a large value intended to be positive, and if it has overflowed,_return {@code Long.MAX_VALUE} instead of a negative number.
codeText: static long adjustForHugeFilesystems(long bytes) {_        if (bytes < 0) {_            return Long.MAX_VALUE__        }_        return bytes__    }
